column2: an A.M. Eatery////other petty faux pas
column3: the knives need sharpening.  i wasn't even able to cut through my slice of tomato (not joking).  when you plate the eggs
column4: please try to get them closer to the center of the plate.  as the waiter brought it to me it almost slid off onto the table.  the hollandaise was dripping off the edge
column5: i shouldn't have to clean up before i start eating.
